content: * to end attach buttons repeat round 1 until ribbing measures 1 5 /4 cm bobble in pattern front bands with us 7/4 5 mm 24 /60 cm circ join mc at bot- tom right front edge of garment pick up and knit 3 sts for every 4 row along the right front all the way up to the neck then 2 sts at the top right front raglan seam then 4 4 4 4 4 5 5 right shoulder sts then 2 sts at the top right back raglan seam then 18 18 18 18 18 20 20 back neck sts then 2 sts at the top left back raglan seam then 4 4 4 4 4 5 5 left shoulder sts then 2 sts at the top left front raglan seam then 3 sts for every 4 row down the left front making sure final st count is a multiple of 4+2 an example of this would be to pick up 154 sts 152 is divisible by 4 plus 2 more sts = 154 row 1 ws p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end row 2 rs k2 *p2 k2 repeat from * to end repeat row 1-2 2 more times buttonhole set-up place removable markers on the right front piece in the section between the underarm and the bottom to mark where button- holes will be made place each marker on 2 purl sts sts that are purls on rs but will be knit sts on ws place the top hole under the start of the v-neck and the bottom hole 2 sts in from the edge the other hole s should be placed within 2-3 /5-8 cm of each other row 7-buttonhole row ws p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to first marker remove marker yo k2tog *work in k2 p2 ribbing to next marker remove marker yo k2tog repeat from * through last marker p2 www elizabethsmithknits com 4 elizabeth smith k n i t s find me online website elizabethsmithknits com pattern support email me at info@elizabethsmithknits com sharing on social media make sure to tag me @elizabethsmithknits i love to see finished photos images and pattern © 2010 2019 elizabeth smith knits/the brown stitch llc all rights reserved www elizabethsmithknits com 5
